sentences.sContent: In this example, you rotate a square on its center, but do not fill the square.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this example, you rotate a square on its center, but do not fill the square.
sentences.sCn: 在这个例子中，您会以中心为原点旋转一个正方形，但不填充这个正方形。

sentences.sContent: ...the Delta has become one of the leading economic regions and a major manufacturing center both of China and the world...
...The Urbanization — migration away from the suburbs to the city center — will be the biggest real estate trend in 2015...
...It's key objective is to play so the center of recovery efforts...
...it was reported that the cost of enrolling an infant or small kid at a childcare center rose 3% in 2012...
...but that only leaves me thirty minutes to clear customs in getting to the city center and it means I have to check in by five thirty...
...The weekly school meeting is at the center of the way sun school is orgnized...
...articles in medical journals and the establishment of a Pennsylvania treatment center for overusers generated interest in the subject...
...but I think you can get it through the money changer in the shopping center across the street...

synos.tran: 集中，使聚集在一点；定中心

phrases.pCn: 加工中心；多工序自动数控机床

words.tran: 分；一分的硬币；森特（等于半音程的百分之一）
中心装饰品；放在餐桌中央的摆饰

trans.tranCn: 圆心， 正中； 中心
